description: Description: Rectyp2 column indicates the second relapse site of childhood Leukemia, with 1=Bone Marrow, 2=Central Nervous System, 3=Testis, 4=Bone Marrow + Central Nervous System, 5=Bone Marrow + Testis, 6=Central Nervous System + Testis, 7=Bone Marrow + Central Nervous System + Testis, 8=Other site(s), 15=Bone Marrow + Other site
